Package com.inrupt.client

Interface Authenticator.DPoP

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultDpopService.DPoPManager
    Enclosing interface:
    Authenticator
    public static interface Authenticator.DPoP
    An abstraction for working with OAuth 2.0 Demonstrating Proof-of-Possession at the Application Layer (DPoP).
    See Also:
    DPoP draft specification

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Set<String> algorithms()
      Return a collection of the supported algorithm names.
      String generateProof​(String algorithm, URI uri, String method)
      Generate a DPoP proof for a given URI and method pair.
      static Authenticator.DPoP of()
      Create a DPoP manager with a default algorithm and keypair.
      static Authenticator.DPoP of​(String algorithm, KeyPair keypair)
      Create a DPoP manager that supports a single algorithm and keypair.
      static Authenticator.DPoP of​(Map<String,​KeyPair> keypairs)
      Create a DPoP manager that supports a collection of algorithms and keypairs.

    • Method Detail

      • generateProof

        String generateProof​(String algorithm,
                     URI uri,
                     String method)
        Generate a DPoP proof for a given URI and method pair.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - the algorithm to use
        uri - the HTTP URI
        method - the HTTP method
        Returns:
        the DPoP Proof, serialized as a Base64-encoded string, suitable for use with HTTP headers

      • algorithms

        Set<String> algorithms()
        Return a collection of the supported algorithm names.
        Returns:
        the algorithm names

      • of

        static Authenticator.DPoP of()
        Create a DPoP manager with a default algorithm and keypair.
        Returns:
        the DPoP manager

      • of

        static Authenticator.DPoP of​(String algorithm,
                             KeyPair keypair)
        Create a DPoP manager that supports a single algorithm and keypair.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - the algorithm
        keypair - the keypair
        Returns:
        the DPoP manager

      • of

        static Authenticator.DPoP of​(Map<String,​KeyPair> keypairs)
        Create a DPoP manager that supports a collection of algorithms and keypairs.
        Parameters:
        keypairs - the algorithm-keypair combinations
        Returns:
        the DPoP manager
